mapper.select: select id, version_name, path, update_time, is_online, version_id from version_con where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into version_con(version_name, path, update_time, is_online, version_id) values (#{versionName}, #{path}, #{updateTime}, #{isOnline}, #{versionId})

insert into version_con(version_name, path, update_time, is_online, version_id) values
(#{entity.versionName}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isOnline}, #{entity.versionId})

insert into version_con(version_name, path, update_time, is_online, version_id) values
(#{entity.versionName}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isOnline}, #{entity.versionId})
on duplicate key update version_name = values(version_name), path = values(path), update_time = values(update_time), is_online = values(is_online), version_id = values(version_id)
mapper.update:
update version_con
version_name = #{versionName},
path = #{path},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_online = #{isOnline},
version_id = #{versionId},
where id = #{id}
